program.name: glib
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-hpux11.23|*-hpux11.31) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Onofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-hpux10*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Ae -z +O2 +Onofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit"
ARGS="--with-threads=none" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Onofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -OPT:Olimit=0"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -std1"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-solaris2.[89]|*-solaris2.1?) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xO2 -xtarget=generic -xarch=v8"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xO2 -xtarget=generic"
ARGS="--enable-threads";; esac
CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:=-O2}" \ LDFLAGS="${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" ${SHELL} ./configure \ --datadir="${_datadir}" ${ARGS+${ARGS}} \ --libdir=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB} --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

item.para: Quote macros in glib.m4 to avoid warnings in newer automake releases
When testing pthread_cond_timedwait(), lock mutex with pthread_mutex_lock() prior to call else undefined behavior results.
Update config.guess and config.sub to properly detect AIX 5
Build SysV-style shared libraries on AIX 5
Force use of shl_load on HP-UX 11.x
Add support for AIX 5.1 (same as AIX 4)
